Add .gitattributes to ensure line endings are normalized

This attribute enables and controls end-of-line normalization. When a text file is normalized, its line endings are converted to LF in the repository.

Source:
https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/docs/gitattributes.html#_tt_text_tt

Merge pull request #52 from humaan/develop

New v0.3.0 fixes and enhancements
updated comments and documentation
version bump to v0.3.0
Issue #28 - allow for shift + tab and refocus to close
Extension to allow modaal close on press of Esc when focus is on a radio or checkbox
Issue #34 - revised content clone
Issue #50 - Revised focus positions and aria attributes for improved accessibility with screen readers.
#35 Follow-up tweak, updated how the dom body variable is initialized/used which would've been an issue had Modaal been included in the head before the body
Fixed #35. Altered when the code looking for inline modals runs so that Modaal will be initited, regardless of when Modaal is included.
Fix issue #33. Inline attribute data-modaal-locked now data-modaal-is-locked to be consistent.
Issue #22 - Scrolling with momentum on devices including adjustment to how the overflow is handled.
Issue #27 and #36 - removed duplicate markup and modified width/height control for iframe content type
Issue #27 - extension for width and height support for most content types.
Fixed click event validation to ensure children of '.modaal-close' element trigger the close method.
Added keyboard-focus styles to the demo page. #25
Bumped version number.
Fixed bug parsing some inline attributes, and lined up the documentation for 4-space tabs.
vendor prefix cleanup to coincide with autoprefixer added. video container centering below 900 height fixed.
Added autoprefixer into watch tasks
updated readme contribution notes
Set indent_size from 2 to 4, to match our standard.
Fixing up indentation.
